xmp_schema.description: $$$/xmp/xmpBJ_description=The following schema describes very simple workflow or job information.
xmp_schema.label: $$$/xmp/xmpBJ_label=Basic Job Ticket

xmp_property.name: JobRef
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/xmpBJ/JobRef_description=References an external job management file for a job process in which the document is being used. Use of job names is under user control. Typical use would be to identify all documents that are part of a particular job or contract. There are multiple values because there can be more than one job using a particular document at any time, and it can also be useful to keep historical information about what jobs a document was part of previously.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/xmpBJ/JobRef_label=Job Ref

xmp_type.name: job
xmp_type.description: $$$/xmp/xmpBJ/job_description=Describes a job for a job-management system.
xmp_type.label: $$$/xmp/xmpBJ/job_label=Job

xmp_field.name: name
xmp_field.description: $$$/xmp/xmpBJ/job/name_description=Informal name of job. This name is for user display and informal systems.
xmp_field.label: $$$/xmp/xmpBJ/job/name_label=Name

xmp_field.name: id
xmp_field.description: $$$/xmp/xmpBJ/job/id_description=Unique ID for the job. This field is a reference into some external job management system.
xmp_field.label: $$$/xmp/xmpBJ/job/id_label=Id

xmp_field.name: url
xmp_field.description: $$$/xmp/xmpBJ/job/url_description=A file URL referencing an external job management file.
xmp_field.label: $$$/xmp/xmpBJ/job/url_label=URL
